data.name: Basking Shark
data.description: Sit start at a flat big pinch hold, next hold will be the sloper abover, move left and find some good jug, then climb up using some slopers and at the top, you will find a good jug during top out.

data.name: Great White Shark
data.description: Sit start and find a big flat hold near the number marker on the images, t[hen move up and you will see a jug above the start of your left hand hold. Keep climbing up, you will see some crimps and good slopers.

data.name: Whale Shark
data.description: Probably the most challenging beginner route in this boulder. Sit start and double start with left hand on a sloper, right hand on a slopery crimp. There is a good sharp jug above your hand hand start hold, and right hand with a pinch hold on the same level. Once you get the right hand pinch, you can switch your left hand to a sidepull. Stand up and find a good sloper above and match hand on it. Then you can top out with the remaining good holds.

data.name: Megamouth Shark
data.description: Sit start on 2 good crimps near the number marker, then bump up to the good jug above. Move your left feet up a bit on a good foot hold, twist the body to get another jug above. Then you can top out with the remaining good jugs.

data.name: New World Order
data.description: Start on the sloping sidepull, use the slopers above.

data.name: Unnamed
data.description: Start on the two small crimps.

data.name: Happy Home
data.description: Start on the obvious big hold.

data.name: Rock Blast 石破天驚
data.description: Start on the good crimp and launch up to the side pull, finish above.

data.name: Hamstar The Cat
data.description: Stand start version of Rock Blast, double start on left hand good pinch, and right hand small crimp.

data.name: The Crown
data.description: Starting with two sloping crimps, make moonboard moves.

data.name: The Sceptre
data.description: Starting on a good jug on the same horizontal level as the starting holds of the crown, find your own beta or sequence to traverse to the start of The Crown, then follow The Crown to top out.

data.name: Hiking
data.description: Start on the sidepull, finish up the slab.

data.name: Lone Wolf
data.description: Start on the good crimps, make technical moves to climb the arete.

data.name: Crack Stairs
data.description: Start on a good sidepull, follow the crack head up the slab.

data.name: Dark Portal
data.description: Start on the good undercut, make body tension moves to get through the lip of the overhang, finish above the slab.

data.name: Lantern 燈籠
data.description: Start on the big ledge, head up above.

data.name: Oblate 奉
data.description: Start on the undercut and side pull next to it, use good crimps to finish above the ledge.

data.name: Monster Strength 怪力
data.description: Start on the big ledge and launch up to a good crimp on the right, finish as line 2.

data.name: God Of Chaos 亂神
data.description: Same start as line 3, but move up directly instead. Make use of the small crimps to do technical/balancy moves. Avoid using the good crimp (right after the start) of line 3.

data.name: Treants 樹精
data.description: Start on the good jug and climb up, avoid the treant behind you !

data.name: Spectral 幽冥
data.description: Start on two sloping crimps and make powerful moves to gain the ledge above.

data.name: Mojo’s Crimp
data.description: Sds version on a sharp crimp.

data.name: Ghost Fire 鬼火
data.description: Start on the big sidepull, launch up to get good holds.

data.name: Ghostbuster
data.description: Start on the circled crimp, make moves to the left and follow problem #7, however the start hold of problem #7 is eliminated.

data.name: Scary Face 鬼臉
data.description: Fun slab starting on good crimps.

data.name: Viking Dinner
data.description: Start on the good crimps.

data.name: Meat And Wine
data.description: Start on the big jug along the crack.

data.name: Brave One
data.description: Start on the good crimp on left and side pull on right, climb along the arete.

data.name: Immortals
data.description: Start on a triangular hold on right and sloper on left, get the next pinchy sloper, finish up above the crimpy hold and painful pocket.

data.name: Frost
data.description: Start on the good jug and launch up.

data.name: Frost Bite
data.description: Start on the left hand hold of line 2, traverse to the left to link line 1.

data.name: Subzero
data.description: Start on two sloping crimps and get to the top by the slopers and crimps.

data.name: Subzero
data.description: Sit start on the obvious side pull and the poor crimp, link to line 2. Avoid using left hand side v3 holds for sds.

data.name: War Skull
data.description: Start on the big pinch and make powerful moves to gain the top.

data.name: Bang
data.description: Start on the good side pull crimp.

data.name: Hiding Mushroom
data.description: Sit on the rock bed and reach to the top.

data.name: Sleepy High-way
data.description: Start of line3, traverse all the way to the top of 6.

data.name: Two-story
data.description: Start on the sloping ledge and reach the top.

data.name: Veins
data.description: Start on the good crimp, one move to the top.

data.name: Humpback Song
data.description: Start on two crimps, get the next good hold, top out above.

data.name: Whale Fall
data.description: Same start as line 1, traverse to the good ledge on the left, then top out above this.

data.name: Minke
data.description: Start on a side pull crimp on left and sloper on right, get the next good crimp.

data.name: Kun 鯤
data.description: Start of line 1, link up line2, then traverse all the way to the whale tail!

data.name: Orca
data.description: Start on a crimp, make powerful moves to get the next good hold.

data.name: Big Blue
data.description: Start at a v-shape good hold and a small crimp, top right above.

data.name: Small Blue
data.description: Start at a crimp on right and sloper on left,  traverse to the left, link up to Big blue left.

data.name: Big Blue (left)
data.description: Start on a good V-shaped hold and a crimp, traverse to the left, making a long move to get the good crimp, and finish up to the left.

data.name: Beluga
data.description: Start on a left good insert and right crimp , get the good crimp up ahead, finish above.

data.name: Falcon Wing
data.description: Start on the good crimps.

data.name: Prey
data.description: Start on the big juggy side pull.

data.name: Dragon Breath
data.description: Start on the poor crimps and fight your way up.

data.name: Dragon Slayer
data.description: Start on the good crimp and side pull, make a dynamic move to get the good crimp above, finish follow up the slab.

data.name: Drink Alone
data.description: Start on a good crimp on the left and a sloping crimp on the right, fight your way up through the face.

data.name: Weaver
data.description: Start on a good sloper, climb up and avoid the tree.

data.name: Short Fuse
data.description: Start on the big sidepull, bump up.

data.name: Fling
data.description: Start on a sidepull on right, and a low gaston crimp on left, make one powerful move.

data.name: Danger
data.description: Start on the good crimp and a sloper, get the good holds on the right.

data.name: Destiny 命運
data.description: Start on a crimp on the left and a sloper on the right. Fly up!

data.name: Black Hound
data.description: Start on two sidepulls, make technical moves to get the good holds above.

data.name: Wuji 無極
data.description: Start on two poor sloping crimp, make powerful move to get the top.

data.name: Kaze 風
data.description: Start on a good side pull crimp on the right and a low crimp on the left, make a dynamic move to get the jug on top.

data.name: Breeze
data.description: Start on a good ledge.

data.name: Magatama 勾玉
data.description: Start on a side pull sloper, make technical moves to get the juggy top.

data.name: Kagami
data.description: Start on the crack side pull, use the obvious crack to climb up.

data.name: Kagami 八咫鏡
data.description: Sit start on lower side pull.

data.name: Immortal Dance 神樂
data.description: Start on a good crimp, use the juggy line to climb up.

data.name: Artifacts
data.description: Start on a crystal lump, climb up directly.

data.name: Artifacts (left)
data.description: Make a dyno move to the jug on left.

data.name: Tsurugi 天叢雲劍
data.description: Sit start on a good pinch, make heel hook moves to get the good ledge.

data.name: Strength 力
data.description: Great one-move problem, start on a sloper.

data.name: Striker
data.description: Start on a good crimp, get the next good ledge, top out above. (You can try to campus the whole line.)

data.name: Sail To The East
data.description: Same start as line 1, go all the way to the left.

data.name: Thousand Sunny 千陽號
data.description: Start on two good slopers, get the next good side pull, then the jug above, top out above.

data.name: Thousand Sunny Eliminate
data.description: Eliminate the good jug, start to trend left below it.

data.name: Going Merry 黃金梅利號
data.description: Start on a sloper on the left and an undercut on right, make a powerful move to get the crimp on the right, finish following the slab.

data.name: Ghost Blade
data.description: Start on the good crimps and climb up.

data.name: True Damage
data.description: Start on the sloper, and a low good crimp.

data.name: Emotional Damage
data.description: Start on two slopers, make strong moves.

data.name: Slab King
data.description: Start on a good jug, use the thin side pull on the right.

data.name: I Hate Slab
data.description: Start on the same jug of line1, move left to get the arete on the left.

data.name: Easy Crack
data.description: Follow the big crack.

data.name: Yellow Submarine
data.description: Start on a side pull and an undercut, traverse all the way to the left, the crimps on the slab can be used, just try not to stand on the slab and walk…

data.name: Cock-pit
data.description: Start on a good pinchy sidepull, climb up along the ridge.

data.name: Bumper Head
data.description: Start at the good undercut beneath the roof, make technical moves to gain the top shelf.

data.name: Stream Line
data.description: Start on a good jug, use the edge to traverse all the way right.

data.name: Drive By
data.description: Start on two gaston crimps, move up the edge above.

data.name: Highway To Hell
data.description: Same start as line 5, traverse to right using small crimps and side pulls. Avoid using the edge of the top.

data.name: Torn
data.description: Start on a double gaston, make shouldery moves to get to the top.

data.name: Boulderizer
data.description: Start on a side pull crimp, get the crimps above.

data.name: Sam
data.description: Start on a sloper.

data.name: Frodo
data.description: Start on a good crimp.

data.name: Rock Slide
data.description: Start on a juggy edge, follow the edge to climb up, down climb on the “slide”, which is the big ledge behind the edge.

data.name: Wing Of Radiance 光之翼
data.description: Start on a poor pinch on left and an okay crimp on right, get the next left crimp above, finish above this.

data.name: Wing Of Radiance
data.description: Even harder sit start version.

data.name: Beam Of Hope
data.description: Start on a good crimp, make use of crimps on the right and above.

data.name: Sunfire 日炎
data.description: Start at the low juggy ledge, get the crimp and then the deep side pull above.

data.name: Blackfire 黑炎
data.description: Same as line 1, traverse left when you get the good side pull, using small crimps to top at the middle.

data.name: Sunset Roller Coaster 日落飛車
Floating City 天空之城
data.description: Start on a good jug, get the good crimps above, finish up the slab.

data.name: Rakia 蒼穹
data.description: Same start as line 1, use the holds on the left of the slab, avoid using the crimps of line 1.

data.name: Moon Tower 月塔
data.description: Same start as line 1, get the undercut of the opposite side instead, climb up through that side.

data.name: Crimson Arrow 紅蓮之矢
data.description: Start on a crimp on the left and a sloper on the right, make powerful moves to get up the slab, for safety reasons, when topping out the slab, the right side can also be used.

data.name: Night Beauty
data.description: Start on a crimp on the left and a good sloper on the right, follow line 4 to get up the slab.

data.name: Unnamed
data.description: Start on a pinchy side pull on left and a crimp on right, make a strong move to get the good crimp above, finish up the slab.

data.name: Buttercup
data.description: Start on the crimps, make technical moves to get good holds above.

data.name: Snake Crack
data.description: Start on the good side pull, climb up using lay back technique.

data.name: Short Journey
data.description: Start on a good side pull, follow the edge to finish above.

data.name: Long Journey
data.description: Same as line1, but traverse to the left once you are on the lip of the ledge.

data.name: Pain Feast
data.description: Start on two poor crimps, get the painful crimps above, finish up the slab.

data.name: Moonlight Chest Low
data.description: Extension of the line 2, start on a pinch, and step on a good hold, then do a POGO move to start hold of line 2, and then follow line 2.

data.name: Moonlight Chest 月光寶盒
data.description: Start on the good crimp, and either trust some small foot holds or just campus first few moves, then use the arete to adjust the body position, then use 2 slopers on top to stand up and reach the further jug to help you top out.

data.name: Mighty Monkey King 齊天大聖
data.description: Start on a volcano-like hold, follow the edge and traverse. After you reach the pinch, you can continue use the line 2 crimp and use the same beta to top out.

data.name: Boyabolomi 波若波囉咪
data.description: Same start as line 3, but top out in the middle.

data.name: Leap On Moon
data.description: Moonboard-like problem, start on a left hand good crimp, and right hand sloper, heel hook on the right and then right hand on the next jug, release right leg and jump to the good jug after putting your left feet on a good foot hold. Follow the edge until your feet reach to the platform and top out.

data.name: Armor Core v4
data.description: Start on a left hand crimp and a right hand mushroom like hold, climb up using some slopery crimps and you can use a right hand far away crimp before reaching the top jug OR do a dynamic move to the top jug.

data.name: Titan Fall
data.description: Simiar to line 1, but after getting slopery crimps, change the right hand position to gaston and then a long move to the left top jug using left hand.

data.name: Nightfall Raven
data.description: Start on 2 slopery crimp, and then a shoulder move to the right, heel hook and then get the good hold above, swing the feet to the right, and then right reach inner right  side good hold, change the left hand from crimp to push to stand up.

data.name: Finger Armor
data.description: Start on a left hand circled crimp, and right hand on a L-shaped crimp, climb up using different sharp crimps and top out.

data.name: Shadow Rail
data.description: Start on a big hold side pull and then climb up.

data.name: Turn And Flip 七轉八倒
Coco Sds
data.description: Start on the glued crimp, launch to the higher crimps and finish above the platform

data.name: Coco
data.description: Start ona crimp and a side pull crimp

data.name: Graveward
data.description: Start on a sloper and a side pull

data.name: Dead Rising
data.description: Start on a good sloper, get the sloper above ,use the crimps slughtly on the left to finish leftward above

data.name: Dead Rising Right
data.description: Start on a good sloper use good holds to trend right

data.name: Gold Shine
data.description: Start on a sloper on left and good undercut on right, make powerful moves to slap the slopers above, finish towards left

data.name: A Hero Is Born 英雄降世
data.description: Start on a line of slopping crimps, get the slopers above by making body tension moves, after getting the jug between the rocks, use both side to top out

data.name: Sparkle
data.description: Start on a crimp and a side pull, finish by linking to the end hold of Golem v2

data.name: Golem
data.description: Sit start on a good side pull, make technical moves using the line of side pulls, finish by matching hands on the good jug

data.name: Pang's Wing 鵬之翼
data.description: Start on a sloper, kick to the left to get a toe hook on the side pulls of Golem v2, make technical moves to traverse to left, finish at the same jug of Golm v2

data.name: Golden Hour 黃金時刻
data.description: Stand start on the good undercut, use the poor holds above to make dynamic moves to get the good sloper on the edge

data.name: Golden Hour 黃金時刻
data.description: Sit start on the sloper

data.name: Forge In Fire 千錘百鍊
data.description: Sit start on the crimpy side pulls, get the holds on the right arete, finish above.

data.name: Forge In Fire
data.description: Start on a good side pull crimp on left and a sloper on right, make compression moves to get the good hold on the edge, finish above

data.name: Green Gold
data.description: Sit start on the side pull slopers, stand up to get the side pulls and crimps, finish by matching hand on the slopping crimp marked on the topos

data.name: Odin’s rage
data.description: Double start on a right hand side pull and left hand crimp, make dynamic moves to get the big edge, finish above

data.name: God of War
data.description: Start on two circled crimps, do a shoulder move to reach the sloper, and then finish above

data.name: God of War Sds
data.description: Sit start on the pinch and undercut, and then connect to the start hold of God of War

data.name: Valhalla
data.description: Start on a left hand undercut and right hand slopery crimp, then do few body tension moves to get the good crimps and jump to another jug, and then topout

data.name: Valhalla High Start
data.description: Start on the good crimps and do a dynamic move to jug and then topout

data.name: Valhalla Sds
data.description: Sit start on the undercut and then connect to the start hold of Valhalla

data.name: Mimir
data.description: Double start, and then do a toehook, find yourself some holds you can use to finish above
